Pay to win skins introduced in to a game to celebrate that its been fair play for 20 years.
Valve is serving a poo cake for this special birthday in the hopes that we will all eat it willingly.
HOW ABOUT NO.

Edit:
More and more players are using the skins. If I want to play w/o skins I have to pay for 3rd pary match making. Its time to abandon ship. Yet another game turned in to garbage. Its sad times for gamers.

We needed anti cheat measures. We got pay to win skins.
I did not get this game for free. I payed for it. Only for them to make garbage out of it.

Edit2:

Cheaters and griefers now dominate the experience.
